p: For the influenza B virus, the WHO ILI case definition also showed the best performance in both all weeks (aDOR 2.47; 95% CI 2.11–2.91) and in epidemic weeks (aDOR 2.23; 95% CI 1.81–2.75). Fever was the symptom with the best performance both in all weeks (aDOR 3.58, 95% CI 2.73–4.71) and in epidemic weeks (3.00, 95% CI 2.11–4.25).
